definitions.definition: A feeling of extreme happiness or cheerfulness, especially related to the acquisition or expectation of something good.
definitions.example: They will be a source of strength and joy in your life.

definitions.definition: Anything that causes such a feeling.
definitions.example: the joys and demands of parenthood

definitions.definition: Luck or success; a positive outcome.
The sign or exhibition of joy; gaiety; merriment; festivity.
To give joy to; to congratulate.
To gladden; to make joyful; to exhilarate.
